description: Hobbies, leisure activities, sports, and entertainment

sentences.english: I play guitar in my free time.
sentences.explanation: 'Jouer de' + instrument. 'Pendant mon temps libre' = in my free time.
'Adorer' = to love. 'Lire des romans' = to read novels. Hobby expressions.
'Faire de la randonnée' = to go hiking. 'Chaque week-end' = every weekend.

sentences.english: He collects stamps from different countries.
sentences.explanation: 'Collectionner' = to collect. 'De différents pays' = from different countries.
'Apprendre à' + infinitive = to learn to. Dance types with definite articles.

sentences.english: She practices yoga twice a week.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du yoga' = to do yoga. 'Deux fois par semaine' = twice a week.

sentences.english: We watch movies at the cinema.
sentences.explanation: 'Regarder des films' = to watch movies. 'Au cinéma' = at the cinema.
'Aimer cuisiner' = to enjoy cooking. Nationality adjectives agree with nouns.

sentences.english: He plays tennis with his friends.
sentences.explanation: 'Jouer au' + sport. 'Avec ses amis' = with his friends. Possessive adjectives.
'Prendre des photos de' = to take photos of. Photography vocabulary.
Passé composé: j'ai commencé. 'Commencer à' + infinitive. 'L'année dernière' = last year.
'Aller nager' = to go swimming. 'En été' = in summer. Seasonal activities.
'Être passionné de/par' = to be passionate about. Academic interests.
'Passer du temps à' + infinitive = to spend time doing. Gardening vocabulary.

sentences.english: She writes in her diary every night.
sentences.explanation: 'Écrire dans son journal' = to write in diary. 'Chaque soir' = every night.
'Construire des maquettes' = to build models. 'Ensemble' = together.
'Écouter de la musique' = to listen to music. Music genre adjectives.
'S'intéresser à' = to be interested in. Reflexive verb with preposition.
'Tricoter' = to knit. 'Pour l'hiver' = for winter. Craft activities.

sentences.english: We play board games on rainy days.
sentences.explanation: 'Jouer aux jeux de société' = to play board games. 'Les jours de pluie' = rainy days.
'Collectionner les cartes postales' = to collect postcards. Vintage collecting hobby.

sentences.english: I practice piano for one hour daily.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du piano' = to practice piano. 'Une heure par jour' = one hour daily.
'Faire du camping' = to go camping. Seasonal outdoor activity vocabulary.

sentences.english: He builds model trains in his garage.
sentences.explanation: 'Construire des trains miniatures' = to build model trains. Model hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: I enjoy birdwatching in the park.
sentences.explanation: 'Observer les oiseaux' = to watch birds. Nature observation hobby.
'Apprendre la calligraphie' = to learn calligraphy. Artistic learning hobby.
'Organiser des tournois' = to organize tournaments. Chess competition vocabulary.
'Peindre à l'aquarelle' = to paint with watercolors. Artistic technique vocabulary.

sentences.english: He volunteers at the animal shelter.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du bénévolat' = to volunteer. Animal welfare hobby vocabulary.
'Pratiquer la méditation' = to practice meditation. Wellness hobby vocabulary.
'Restaurer des meubles' = to restore furniture. Restoration hobby vocabulary.
'Assister à des concerts' = to attend concerts. Live music vocabulary.

sentences.english: He creates digital art on his tablet.
sentences.explanation: 'Créer de l'art numérique' = to create digital art. Digital hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: I grow herbs in my kitchen garden.
sentences.explanation: 'Cultiver des herbes aromatiques' = to grow herbs. Kitchen gardening vocabulary.
'Jouer dans le théâtre' = to perform in theater. Community theater vocabulary.

sentences.english: We explore historical sites on vacation.
sentences.explanation: 'Explorer des sites historiques' = to explore historical sites. Cultural tourism hobby.

sentences.english: I learn origami from online tutorials.
sentences.explanation: 'Apprendre grâce à' = to learn thanks to. Online learning hobby vocabulary.
'Jouer au basket' = to play basketball. Team sports vocabulary.
'Dessiner ses propres bijoux' = to design one's own jewelry. Creative hobby vocabulary.
'Participer à des courses caritatives' = to participate in charity runs. Charitable sports.
'Fabriquer du savon maison' = to make homemade soap. Craft hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: He studies astronomy with a telescope.
sentences.explanation: 'Étudier l'astronomie' = to study astronomy. Scientific hobby vocabulary.
'Apprendre en ligne' = to learn online. Online dance learning vocabulary.
'Élever des poissons' = to breed fish. Aquarium hobby vocabulary.
'Organiser des randonnées' = to organize hikes. Group outdoor activity vocabulary.

sentences.english: I collect rare coins from different countries.
sentences.explanation: 'Collectionner les pièces rares' = to collect rare coins. Numismatic hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: He plays harmonica in a blues band.
sentences.explanation: 'Jouer de l'harmonica' = to play harmonica. Musical ensemble vocabulary.

sentences.english: She writes poetry in her spare time.
sentences.explanation: 'Écrire de la poésie' = to write poetry. Creative writing hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: I practice archery at the club.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer le tir à l'arc' = to practice archery. Precision sports vocabulary.

sentences.english: We build sandcastles at the beach.
sentences.explanation: 'Construire des châteaux de sable' = to build sandcastles. Beach activity vocabulary.

sentences.english: He learns magic tricks from books.
sentences.explanation: 'Apprendre des tours de magie' = to learn magic tricks. Entertainment hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: I volunteer at the local library.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du bénévolat' = to volunteer. Community service vocabulary.

sentences.english: She makes quilts for her family.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire des courtepointes' = to make quilts. Traditional craft vocabulary.
'Assister à des festivals' = to attend festivals. Cultural event vocabulary.

sentences.english: I practice martial arts twice a week.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer les arts martiaux' = to practice martial arts. Combat sports vocabulary.
'Monter ses ordinateurs' = to build computers. Technology hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: She practices ice skating at the rink.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du patinage' = to ice skate. Winter sports vocabulary.
'Créer des animations' = to create animations. Digital art hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: We go mushroom picking in autumn.
sentences.explanation: 'Aller aux champignons' = to go mushroom picking. Seasonal foraging vocabulary.

sentences.english: He teaches guitar lessons to children.
sentences.explanation: 'Donner des cours' = to give lessons. Music teaching vocabulary.

sentences.english: I brew my own beer at home.
sentences.explanation: 'Brasser sa bière' = to brew beer. Home brewing hobby vocabulary.
'Pratiquer la natation synchronisée' = to practice synchronized swimming. Aquatic sports.
'Organiser des fêtes costumées' = to organize costume parties. Party planning vocabulary.

sentences.english: I study genealogy to trace my family.
sentences.explanation: 'Étudier la généalogie' = to study genealogy. Family research hobby vocabulary.
'Jouer en compétition' = to play competitively. Competitive gaming vocabulary.

sentences.english: She makes documentary films about nature.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire des documentaires' = to make documentaries. Filmmaking hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: I participate in escape room challenges.
sentences.explanation: 'Participer à des escape games' = to participate in escape rooms. Puzzle activity vocabulary.
'Assister à des cours de cuisine' = to attend cooking classes. Culinary learning vocabulary.
'Construire des réseaux' = to build networks. Model railroad vocabulary.
'Pratiquer le stand-up' = to practice stand-up comedy. Performance hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: She organizes book clubs at work.
sentences.explanation: 'Organiser des clubs de lecture' = to organize book clubs. Reading community vocabulary.

sentences.english: I practice parkour in the city.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer le parkour' = to practice parkour. Urban sports vocabulary.
'Collectionner les disques vinyles' = to collect vinyl records. Music collecting vocabulary.

sentences.english: He practices blacksmithing as a hobby.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer la forge' = to practice blacksmithing. Traditional craft vocabulary.

sentences.english: I design websites for small businesses.
sentences.explanation: 'Concevoir des sites web' = to design websites. Web design hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: She trains her dog for agility competitions.
sentences.explanation: 'Entraîner pour les concours' = to train for competitions. Dog training vocabulary.

sentences.english: We go spelunking in limestone caves.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire de la spéléologie' = to go spelunking. Cave exploration vocabulary.
'Créer des podcasts' = to create podcasts. Digital media hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: He practices beekeeping in his backyard.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer l'apiculture' = to practice beekeeping. Agricultural hobby vocabulary.

sentences.english: She volunteers as a museum guide.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du bénévolat comme guide' = to volunteer as a guide. Museum volunteer vocabulary.
'Restaurer des motos' = to restore motorcycles. Vehicle restoration vocabulary.
'Organiser des soirées cinéma' = to organize movie nights. Outdoor entertainment vocabulary.
'Collectionner les météorites' = to collect meteorites. Geological collecting vocabulary.

sentences.english: I practice calligraphy with brush pens.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer avec des pinceaux' = to practice with brushes. Calligraphy tools vocabulary.

sentences.english: She grows orchids in her greenhouse.
sentences.explanation: 'Cultiver des orchidées' = to grow orchids. Specialized gardening vocabulary.
'Faire des spectacles d'improvisation' = to perform improv shows. Performance hobby vocabulary.
'Apprendre les danses folkloriques' = to learn folk dances. Cultural dance vocabulary.
'Fabriquer des meubles sur mesure' = to build custom furniture. Woodworking vocabulary.

sentences.english: She teaches yoga classes at the studio.
sentences.explanation: 'Donner des cours de yoga' = to teach yoga classes. Fitness teaching vocabulary.
'Participer à des reconstitutions' = to participate in reenactments. Historical hobby vocabulary.
'Organiser des concerts de charité' = to organize charity concerts. Charitable events vocabulary.

sentences.english: He creates sculptures from recycled materials.
sentences.explanation: 'Créer avec des matériaux recyclés' = to create with recycled materials. Eco-art vocabulary.
'Étudier les langues étrangères' = to study foreign languages. Language learning vocabulary.
'Pratiquer la danse sur tissu aérien' = to practice aerial silk dancing. Aerial arts vocabulary.
'Organiser des événements de nettoyage' = to organize clean-up events. Environmental activism.

sentences.english: I create stop-motion videos with clay.
sentences.explanation: 'Créer avec de l'argile' = to create with clay. Animation hobby vocabulary.
'S'entraîner pour les courses' = to train for races. Extreme sports vocabulary.

sentences.english: She makes artisanal cheese at home.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du fromage artisanal' = to make artisanal cheese. Food craft vocabulary.
'Participer au géocaching' = to participate in geocaching. Modern treasure hunting vocabulary.

sentences.english: We create collaborative art projects online.
sentences.explanation: 'Créer des projets collaboratifs' = to create collaborative projects. Digital art community vocabulary.
